duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all functions of the restaurant, including guest relations, staffing, and food & beverage quality.
Supervise and develop FOH/BOH staff, ensuring proper ambiance, housekeeping, and safety standards.
Create and maintain SOPs to uphold standards and ensure the efficient and profitable performance of the restaurant.
Direct all restaurant operations and ensure compliance with health, safety, and service standards.
Plan and adjust staffing, scheduling, and financial goals for the restaurant's optimal performance.
Address any unexpected problems or emergencies that may arise during the shift.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management or related field (Master's preferred)
